abstract: Morgan Stanley said on Friday that it had received government approval to buy the remaining stake in the wealth management joint venture it formed with Citigroup in 2009.
snippet: Morgan Stanley said on Friday that it had received government approval to buy the remaining stake in the wealth management joint venture it formed with Citigroup in 2009.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley plans this month to buy the remaining stake in the wealth management joint venture it formed with Citigroup in the depths of the financial crisis.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Cleared to Buy Rest of Wealth Management Business
